column3: 2015) send sympathy card jennifer jill dahl
column5: went home to be with her lord on june 19
column7: surrounded by her family. she was a child of beauty
column8: a being of grace with the knowledge of duty plus lifes joy on her face. she had a heart of compassion for the tired and weary. her eyes laugh
column9: but many times teary. jennifer was born on december 1
column10: 1971 in peoria the daughter of william and jill crandell dahl. surviving is her mother jill (fred) thomas of germantown hills
column11: her father william (evie) dahl of east peoria. she also leaves behind two wonderful sons that she loved more than life itself andrew (whitney) william dahl of st. marys naval base in kings bay
column12: ga and kyle alexander noll of washington. also surviving are two brothers casey j. (tera) thomas of metamora and todd waechter of chillicothe
column13: il: two sisters shelly (tim) baily of decatur
column14: il and tracy waechter of germantown hills
column15: il as well as a host of aunts
column18: nephews and cousins. a special thank you from the family to doug talbert for the many years of loving and caring for jennifer. he will always be in our hearts as he was in hers. her sister terri lee dahl
column21: paternal grandparents howard and sis dahl and maternal grandparents luther and rosanna crandell preceded her in death. she attended northwoods community church in peoria. cremation rites have been accorded. a time to celebrate jennifers life will be from 4:30pm until 8:00 on tuesday
column23: 2015 at the east peoria boat club on collins lane. memorials in her name may be given to osf st. francis hospice. notes of condolences may be sent using www. peoriafuneral. com. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2011 - 2015 affordable funeral & cremation service funeral home website by batesville
